Articles.Content:
Hello my fellow Kerbal enthusiasts. I just wanted to drop by and say hello. I started playing KSP a few patches ago (I'm not sure which one particularly).

Anyways, I am looking forward to building rockets of my own, as well as testing yours!

If anyone needs someone to test out rockets, please don't hesitate to PM me. Thanks!

Welcome To da hood bruh!

Just kidding. Welcome to the forums!

Welcome to the forums!

You may want to show off some of your best designs over in the Spacecraft Exchange, or take a look at others' work there and offer your skills. You may also want to share some of your accumulated wisdom answering questions from new players over in the How To section of the forums. (Don't feel afraid to ask your own if you need to, of course.) Above all, feel free to jump right into any topic that interests you.

Happy landings!
